html:
Welcome to {company_name}!

Hello {first_name},

Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter! To complete your subscription and ensure you receive our updates, please confirm your email address by clicking the button below:

Confirm My Subscription

If the button doesn't work, you can also copy and paste this link into your browser:

{confirmation_url}

If you did not subscribe to our newsletter, you can safely ignore this email.

Best regards,
The {company_name} Team

This email was sent to {email}.

If you have any questions, please contact us at support@{domain}.
